products.name: Sony A6000
products.desc: Sleek and quick, the Sony a6000 is a versatile APS-C mirrorless camera offering a well-balanced combination of apt stills performance and Full HD video capabilities, along with fast AF performance and intuitive handling.

products.name: Nike Air Jordan Low
products.desc: The Air Jordan 1 Low OG remakes the classic sneaker with new colors and textures. Premium materials and accents give fresh expression to an all-time favorite.

products.name: PlayStation 5
products.desc: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback1, adaptive triggers1 and 3D Audio*, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation games.

products.name: Jimmy Butler Funko Pop
products.desc: From Heat, Jimmy Butler (Black Jersey), as a stylized Pop! vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box.

products.name: Adidas Yeezy Boost
products.desc: The YEEZY BOOST 350 V2 features an upper composed of re-engineered Primeknit. The post-dyed monofilament side stripe is woven into the upper.

products.name: iPhone 14
products.desc: 21% more screen. Now that's big. iPhone 14 Plus has a supersized Super Retina XDR display.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.desc: Discover the fastest, most powerful Xbox ever with the Xbox Series X. Enjoy 4K gaming at up to 120 frames per second on this next generation video game console.

products.name: Sony XM4 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
products.desc: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Over-the-Ear Headphone in black. Wireless Bluetooth streaming and Smartphone compatibility for hands-free.

products.name: Lego Millennium Falcon
products.desc: LEGO® Star Wars™ Millennium Falcon™ · Relive the Star Wars™ saga. · Go inside for more adventure! · Open the cockpit. · Defeat the First Order. · True to the saga.

products.name: RTX 4090
products.desc: The NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4090 is the ultimate GeForce GPU. It brings an enormous leap in performance, efficiency, and AI-powered graphics.
